entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
